properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 1:48AM MST until February 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches at lower elevations, with up to 6 inches in the
mountains.

* WHERE...Meagher, Judith Basin, and Cascade.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially during
the morning commute. Areas of blowing snow could significantly
reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off during the late morning
or early afternoon hours today, but another round of
accumulating snow is expected to return to the region Tuesday
afternoon and persist throughout Tuesday night.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING
